description:
Part of their bestselling prAna Basics collection, this versatile style is Fair Trade Certified™, meaning the breathably soft organic cotton and the facility it was made in are approved by Fair Trade USA.

Kind of makes you feel good, doesn't it? You know what else feels good? The delightfully soft fabric on your skin as you wear this easy, breezy men's tank all summer long.
name: Prana prAna Tank - Standard - Mens
